text: Welcome to how to cook that
I am Ann Reardon

This week I am making you a bonus mini episode
on how to make mario mushrooms.

For the red I am using red candy melts, you
can use white chocolate if you prefer and
colour it with oil based food colouring.

Melt them if you are using melts, or if you
are using chocolate you will need to temper
it.
Then fill a silcone hemisphere mold.
Leave it for a moment and then tip it out.
Scrape off any excess from around the tops.
And then leave them upside down to set.

If you are using melts you can put it in the
freezer and it will take around 10 minutes

if you are using chocolate then leave it one
the bench to set.

Then peel off the silicone and you will have
shiny red domes.

Melt some white chocolate or melts and use
them to attach some white chocolate melts
or candy melts around the top of the domes.

Next take a small container, or I am using
a measuring cup and fill it with white chocolate
and let it set firmly.

Once it is firm you can just tip that out
of the mold.

Use food safe edible marker and draw eyes
onto the bottom half of you white chocolate

and then using some more melted chocolate
attach the domes on top.
And you have some cut little mario mushrooms.

This is a bonus video so make sure you click
on the link to go to the full episode this
week on how to make a chocolate garden.

Or click to go to the channel and see more
chocolate creations cakes and dessert videos.
Have a great week and I will see you Friday
